controlledIdentifierDocument.description:
A controlled identifier document that is associated with the verification method
 used to verify the securing mechanism (i,e the DID)

controller.description:
The controller of the verification method associated with the securing mechanism,
 usually it represents the issuer.

document.description: A conforming document which represents the Verifiable Credential

errors.description: A list represents zero or more errors generated by the verification process

mediaType.description: The media type of the Verifiable Credential (ex: application/vc)

warnings.description: A list represents zero or more warnings generated by the verification process

title: The result returned from the verification process defined [here]
